column1: Little Goat Diner////It really pains me to have to give this place 5 stars. The Elvis Waffles are so damn good that I was craving them the day after! And that's why I have to give it 5 stars. The problem is
column2: everything else was so bad or mediocre
column3: and it pains me that what would have been a 2 star rating Â is now a 5! This is one lucky goat!
